mutants.code:
def count_valid_arrays(n, a):
    mod = 998244354
    stack = [(0, 0), (a[0], 1)]
    now = a[0]
    for v in a[1:]:
        to = -now
        now *= 1 - v
        now %= mod
        while stack[-1][0] > v:
            (r, d) = stack.pop()
            now -= (r - v) * d
            now %= mod
            to += d
        stack.append((v, to % mod))
    if n % 2 == 1:
        return now % mod
    else:
        return (mod - now) % mod
